title: Account Region Transfer, Account has Zero
body: So I was getting back into League to play with some friends. Keep in mind I did not touch League in over two years. However I remembered my account was on EUW. So found out there was a Region Transfer option, costs money sadly, so I looked into it to see if it was worth it. Sumamrized the cost of the things I had and yeah it was basically worth the 2.6k RP. So I had then purchased a 20 Euro package of Riot Points to be able to get the RP to perform the transfer. Once the transaction was complete I then immediately performed the transfer and it happened instantaneously basically. I logged in with my new username because the one I had for EUW I had already made for North America. So logging in with the new one I go into the account... I have abolutely nothing. 0 RP & 1 IP, zero champions, zero skins, no Runes not the 1 loot box I had opened for the tech stuff. My level was back to 1, It was as if it was a fresh account but with the odd 1 IP. Idk if yo ustart with one IP I forget. Anyone have experienced this or anything like that?

replies.body: Is it with the account you're posting from right now?  It sounds like you might be logging onto the wrong account if it's looking pretty empty.  Just to be sure, I suggest filling out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so we can be sure we locate the right account and make sure everything transferred accordingly.

Yes this is the account. My EUW was FlashToroGaming as both username and summoner name. However When I performed the transfer I had already made a North America account with the Username FlashToroGaming summoner name FlashToroUS. So when the transfer was done I changed the username to FlashToro only to keep it simple. THe summoner name I also changed to FlashToro but when transfered it maintained the FlashToroGaming summoner name which on the page for transfers I saw it wa slisted that that would happen. So I am logging into the now named Flashtoro Username. I have filled a ticket just under the wrong category so I assume I should fill out another?
